description: The adversary extracts delimiters and special characters set for the LLM, such as those used in RAG applications to differentiate between context and user prompts. These can later be exploited to confuse or manipulate the LLM into misbehaving.
name: Delimiters and Special Character Extraction

object_references.description: An adversary can discover information about how the AI system distinguishes between context and user prompts or retrieve special characters used by the system to facilitate future attacks
